title: Anthem tops forecasts on growing membership, premium increases
text: Anthem ANTM, +2.84% reported a 23% increase in third-quarter net income to $1.18 billion, or $4.55 a share, as revenue rose 15% to $26.44 billion after increasing medical enrollment by 1.1 million and increasing premiums. Adjusted for items, Anthem said it would've earned $4.87 a share. The company said it forecasts full-year adjusted EPS above $19.40 a share. Analysts polled by FactSet expected third-quarter earnings of $4.82 a share on revenue of $25.9 billion, and full-year earnings of $19.35.
